desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.thai: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.ko: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。
desc.zh_tw: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.thai: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.ko: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
desc.zh_tw: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.thai: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.ko: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
desc.zh_tw: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.en: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.jp: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.thai: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.ko: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十二首曲子，尤其用于“故事”页及其下属页面中，以及每个故事的结尾（即“To Be Continued”未完待续界面）。
desc.zh_tw: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
